channel.title: WildernessReLoaded [Updated]
channel.description:
[url=http://g.imagehost.org/view/0906/wildernessbanner][img]http://g.imagehost.org/0906/wildernessbanner.gif[/img][/url] I added a lot of features to this server also its my first server ever i made So plz don't flame ;)
I started Coding this server a month ago yea :D im slow :D but i have a lot of time ;D Server&Client i using is:Tragedy pking[pi] Credits to: tragedy pking[pi], me And to moparscape community Cuz all tuts and help from here :)
And here my server features Also before this i wanna say: This server don't have custom animations or gfx cuz I ddnt work a lot with client added only pvp interface and same little thinks So don't say its shit if here is used not real item models , emute's or gfx's.
*Full Godwars (my full godwars isnt real rs gwd its just all bosses kc monsters&interface :P) *Metal Dragons (Bronze, Iron ,Steel ,Mithril) *Fishing ,Firemaking ,Thieving ,agility. (Fishing - Added emutes and small fishing fix, Firemaking - added basic firemaking No-clip not added yet , thieving added donator custom thieving stalls , agility - Almost working wilderness agility area 70%) *Slayer Npc Area, Slayer points (Slayer npc area -all slayer tower monsters moved around the wilderness, Added slayer point system (then you finish task you will get 1 if ur slayer level higher 2 , 3 ,6 ,10 ,15 ,25 slayer points) *Assault Minigame (assault minigame - it's same like old delta assault minigame) *PVP AREAS (added pvp areas + pvp safe areas with pvp, pvpsafe interface) *Overload Potion (well its not real rs pot but have same effect also going to make it better) *Dragon claws special *PVP ARRMOR, WEAPONS (well its already was added here :D) * 90% arrmor and weapons wields on correct slot also Fixed all bugged items and weapons *New Home, new Woodcutting&Fishing areas *Clue scrolls with reward (still in progress gonna complete it soon) *Fixed clanchat and lsp message *Well I'm sure i added more features but can't remember now :D *other features http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,463182.msg3388019.html#msg3388019
Here same pictures: [url=http://d.imagehost.org/view/0711/Pic1][img]http://d.imagehost.org/0711/Pic1.png[/img][/url] [url=http://b.imagehost.org/view/0911/pic2][img]http://b.imagehost.org/0911/pic2.png[/img][/url] [url=http://d.imagehost.org/view/0276/pic3][img]http://d.imagehost.org/0276/pic3.png[/img][/url] [url=http://d.imagehost.org/view/0483/Arma_drop][img]http://d.imagehost.org/0483/Arma_drop.png[/img][/url] [url=http://b.imagehost.org/view/0779/pic6][img]http://b.imagehost.org/0779/pic6.png[/img][/url] [url=http://b.imagehost.org/view/0420/pic8][img]http://b.imagehost.org/0420/pic8.png[/img][/url] [url=http://d.imagehost.org/view/0320/pic12][img]http://d.imagehost.org/0320/pic12.png[/img][/url] [url=http://d.imagehost.org/view/0661/pic14][img]http://d.imagehost.org/0661/pic14.png[/img][/url] [url=http://d.imagehost.org/view/0236/pic16][img]http://d.imagehost.org/0236/pic16.png[/img][/url] [url=http://d.imagehost.org/view/0045/1111][img]http://d.imagehost.org/0045/1111.png[/img][/url] [url=http://d.imagehost.org/view/0696/2111][img]http://d.imagehost.org/0696/2111.png[/img][/url] [url=http://d.imagehost.org/download/0870/93111][img]http://d.imagehost.org/0870/93111.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://d.imagehost.org/view/0304/974111][img]http://d.imagehost.org/0304/974111.png[/img][/url] [url=http://d.imagehost.org/view/0480/lolfm][img]http://d.imagehost.org/0480/lolfm.png[/img][/url]
[size=14pt]What I going to do now[/size]
Adding D calw gfx&animtion Curse Prayers anims&gfx Changing same areas ------------------------------------------[UPDATED]- 2011/01/07---------------------------
Clue scroll update Added caskets with reward here small preview Example of low level clue scroll [url=http://j.imagehost.org/view/0427/lowclue][img]http://j.imagehost.org/0427/lowclue.png[/img][/url] Example of medium level clue scroll [url=http://j.imagehost.org/view/0441/medclue][img]http://j.imagehost.org/0441/medclue.png[/img][/url] Example of Hard clue scroll [url=http://g.imagehost.org/view/0425/hardclue][img]http://g.imagehost.org/0425/hardclue.png[/img][/url] Example of elite clue scroll [url=http://g.imagehost.org/view/0319/eliteclue][img]http://g.imagehost.org/0319/eliteclue.png[/img][/url]
Will gonna add full working clue scroll's tomorrow ------------------------------------------[UPDATED]- 2011/01/08--------------------------- Changed woodcutting area [url=http://j.imagehost.org/view/0778/wcarea][img]http://j.imagehost.org/0778/wcarea.png[/img][/url] Also changed donator area (now it have same npc's) [url=http://g.imagehost.org/view/0034/disland][img]http://g.imagehost.org/0034/disland.png[/img][/url] [url=http://g.imagehost.org/view/0220/disland2][img]http://g.imagehost.org/0220/disland2.png[/img][/url] And progress at clue scrolls well need to fix it more but start good :D [url=http://g.imagehost.org/download/0554/clue11][img]http://g.imagehost.org/0554/clue11.jpg[/img][/url] Added chaotic maul its almost perfect adding other chaotic items and staff of light with effect [url=http://j.imagehost.org/view/0464/chaoticmm][img]http://j.imagehost.org/0464/chaoticmm.png[/img][/url] ------------------------------------------[UPDATED]- 2011/01/09--------------------------- Added other chaotic weapons [url=http://c.imagehost.org/download/0151/chaoticweps][img]http://c.imagehost.org/0151/chaoticweps.jpg[/img][/url] also added satff of light with effect (staff of light give you +10 mage damage) :D [url=http://c.imagehost.org/view/0618/stafoflight][img]http://c.imagehost.org/0618/stafoflight.png[/img][/url] Fire wave fTW :D

item.title: WildernessReLoaded [Updated]
item.dc:creator: @crazyfazespy crazyfazespy
item.description:
@crazyfazespy wrote:


I added a lot of features to this server also its my first server ever i made So plz don’t flame

I started Coding this server a month ago yea im slow but i have a lot of time ;D
Server&Client i using is:Tragedy pking[pi]
Credits to: tragedy pking[pi], me And to moparscape community Cuz all tuts and help from here

And here my server features Also before this i wanna say: This server don’t have custom animations or gfx cuz I ddnt work a lot with client added only pvp interface and same little thinks So don’t say its shit if here is used not real item models , emute’s or gfx’s.

*Full Godwars (my full godwars isnt real rs gwd its just all bosses kc monsters&interface :P)
*Metal Dragons (Bronze, Iron ,Steel ,Mithril)
*Fishing ,Firemaking ,Thieving ,agility. (Fishing - Added emutes and small fishing fix, Firemaking - added basic firemaking No-clip not added yet , thieving added donator custom thieving stalls , agility - Almost working wilderness agility area 70%)
*Slayer Npc Area, Slayer points (Slayer npc area -all slayer tower monsters moved around the wilderness, Added slayer point system (then you finish task you will get 1 if ur slayer level higher 2 , 3 ,6 ,10 ,15 ,25 slayer points)
*Assault Minigame (assault minigame - it’s same like old delta assault minigame)
*PVP AREAS (added pvp areas + pvp safe areas with pvp, pvpsafe interface)
*Overload Potion (well its not real rs pot but have same effect also going to make it better)
*Dragon claws special
*PVP ARRMOR, WEAPONS (well its already was added here :D)

  • 90% arrmor and weapons wields on correct slot also Fixed all bugged items and weapons
    *New Home, new Woodcutting&Fishing areas
    *Clue scrolls with reward (still in progress gonna complete it soon)
    *Fixed clanchat and lsp message
    *Well I’m sure i added more features but can’t remember now
    *other features http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,463182.msg3388019.html#msg3388019

Here same pictures:













[size=14pt]What I going to do now[/size]

Adding D calw gfx&animtion
Curse Prayers anims&gfx
Changing same areas
------------------------------------------[UPDATED]- 2011/01/07---------------------------

Clue scroll update
Added caskets with reward
here small preview
Example of low level clue scroll

Example of medium level clue scroll

Example of Hard clue scroll

Example of elite clue scroll

Will gonna add full working clue scroll’s tomorrow
------------------------------------------[UPDATED]- 2011/01/08---------------------------
Changed woodcutting area

Also changed donator area (now it have same npc’s)


And progress at clue scrolls well need to fix it more but start good

Added chaotic maul its almost perfect adding other chaotic items and staff of light with effect

------------------------------------------[UPDATED]- 2011/01/09---------------------------
Added other chaotic weapons

also added satff of light with effect (staff of light give you +10 mage damage)

Fire wave fTW
